data.text:
Live Stream

The best place to be on the Lord’s Day is in his house with brothers and sisters in Christ worshipping together. “For a day in your courts is better than a thousand elsewhere.” Psalm 84:10. We realize however there are times when you may be ill or providentially hindered from attending. It’s with that in mind that we provide a live stream of our Sunday morning and Sunday evening services. You will be able to participate in the entire worship service from nearly anywhere in the world. The Sunday morning worship service begins at 11:00am ET. The Sunday evening worship service begins at 6:00pm ET.

In the event you’re having trouble with the livestream try the audio only option by clicking the button.

Audio Only
